metadata.title: CVE-2024-38381 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:nci: Fix uninit-value in nci_rx_work syzbot reported the followinguninit-value access issue [1] nci_rx_work() parses received packet fromndev->rx_q. It should be validated header size, payload size and totalpacket size before processing the packet. If an invalid packet is detected,it should be silently discarded.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
